thread.section_title: SA Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SA Expeditions | saexpeditions.com
thread.title: Jeri

author: Jeri
title: Jeri
text:
SA Expeditions had everything covered from airline tickets, admissions to museums, pick ups, tour guides,and hotel reservations. Everything was done on time and we were not disappointed with the suggestions that were given to us about the trip. We wanted to be is small groups which made the trip more enjoyable. The information that our guides provided were above and beyond my expectations. Finally the food was fantastic and I now need to go on a diet.
Our group would like to return to the Galapagos Islands and do the Southern tour.
